mapper.sql: noteplansid, noteplanname, is_rl, planstatus, ischangedsmow, startdate, enddate, smcreatorid, smownerid, modifiedby, groupid, createdtime, modifiedtime, deleted, approved, approvedby
mapper.insert: insert into xm_noteplans (noteplansid, noteplanname, is_rl, planstatus, ischangedsmow, startdate, enddate, smcreatorid, smownerid, modifiedby, groupid, createdtime, modifiedtime, deleted, approved, approvedby, executor, description ) values (#{noteplansid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noteplanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ischangedsmow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executor,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update xm_noteplans
noteplanname = #{noteplanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_rl = #{isRl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planstatus = #{planstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ischangedsmow = #{ischangedsmow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE},
enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE},
smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
executor = #{executor,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where noteplansid = #{noteplansid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xm_noteplans set noteplanname = #{noteplanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_rl = #{isRl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planstatus = #{planstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ischangedsmow = #{ischangedsmow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE}, enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, executor = #{executor,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where noteplansid = #{noteplansid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update xm_noteplans set noteplanname = #{noteplanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_rl = #{isRl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planstatus = #{planstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ischangedsmow = #{ischangedsmow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=DATE}, enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE}, smcreatorid = #{smcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smownerid = #{smownerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdtime = #{createdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedtime = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approved = #{approved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approvedby = #{approvedby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where noteplansid = #{noteplansid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM xm_noteplans LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_noteplans.smownerid WHERE xm_noteplans.deleted = 0 and 1=1 ${filter}

select xm_noteplans.noteplanname,xm_users.user_name FROM xm_noteplans LEFT JOIN xm_users ON xm_users.id = xm_noteplans.smownerid WHERE xm_noteplans.deleted = 0 and 1=1 ${filter} limit #{start},#{rows}
